name: todoist_scrape_labels
description: Scrape all labels from Todoist. Requires login.

steps.code: const labels = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/label/"], [class*="label_item"]')).map(el => { const name = el.textContent?.trim()||''; const count = el.querySelector('.count, [class*="count"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; return { name, task_count: count }; }).filter(l=>l.name&&l.name.length<100); return { labels }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
